did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
1975-1976

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.781, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred on 1978 August 9.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by the president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: General Records, 1975-1976 Boxes 1-25
Series II: Administrative Committees, 1975-1976 Boxes 25-26

scopecontent.p: ABC TV, ACTION, Shift of Adult Education to Lane High School, Albemarle Sheriff's Office Antenna on Observatory Mountain, Alcoa Foundation Scholarship, Baccalaureate Invitation to Alan Alda, Alpha Phi Alpha re: Farmington and Minority Students

American Civil Liberties Union Meeting to Discuss the Honor System; Correspondence, Invitations from and Information on Various National Associations, such as American Cancer Society, American Council of Learned Societies, etc.
